alert.note: Alert for Jim Hogg (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 9:09PM CDT until April 05 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN JIM HOGG COUNTY... At 908 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Thompsonville, or 11 miles southwest of Hebbronville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Hebbronville, Las Lomitas, Gruy Stadium, Thompsonville, Jim Hogg County Airport, Hebbronville High School, South Fork Estates and Hebbronville Border Patrol Station. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
